content:
That sounds wonderful! I'm sure Rachel will appreciate the well wishes. It's great that you're supporting her on this special day. Celebrating a friend's achievement is a wonderful way to strengthen your bond and create new memories together.

I hope you have a fantastic time at the event, and I'm sure Rachel's book will be a huge success. Don't forget to take some time to relax and enjoy the celebration – you've earned it!

Feel free to reach out if you need anything else or want to discuss more books (because, let's be honest, there's always time for that). Have a fantastic afternoon, and I'll catch you later!
